name: NFT Paint
description:
This NFT is a fun tool to generate your own NFT by simple brushes. Just select your brush, press left mouse button and move mouse pointer (spray) over the page. Also you can use "New" button to clear all and "Save NFT" button to save what you draw, on your device.

Help
---------------------------------------
Shortcut keys to generate your own NFT:

Key     Action
---     ----------------------------
n       New page
s       Save your drawing on your device
[       minimize brush size
]       maximize brush size
r       change brush to rectangle
c       change brush to circle
t       change brush to triangle
l       change brush to line
a       add smooth movement to your drawing
-------------------------------------------
* you can resize brush size while drawing ( press "[" or "]" + holding mouse button down)
* change brush type and then click "n", to change background style.

:: Just have fun and send me on twitter what you draw.
